Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Great investment opportunity on the N/E corner of Dundas Street and Second Street. Stand alone, single tenanted building. Long term lease in place with Enterprise Rent-A-Car. Electronic sign also on the property providing additional income to the investment.

For sale, the former Ice House. Approximately 49,185 sq.ft. of unique space that has zoning in place for a variety of commercial uses. Great location with multiple developments occurring in the immediate area and only minutes to Highway 401 via Wellington Road.

Main and Lower commercial property for sale located at the corner of Wellington and Dundas in Downtown London. Main floor will be vacant and ready to lease/owner occupy on January 1, 2022. Lower level is rented to a personal trainer.
